channel.title: Movement on Worldwide Stew
channel.description: Recent content in Movement on Worldwide Stew

item.title: Stretch
item.description: Cassie, let’s go for a walk. Cassie, our dog responds more slowly than usual. She usually gets to the door first. She’s feeling lazy this morning. Finally, at another beckon, she arises. But, as she does, she takes a long, deep stretch. Her body lengthens. She twists like her body is a towel being wrung out. Then, she releases a full-body shake. Now, she was ready to go. Our walk could begin.

item.title: How I'd like the world to be
item.description: When voting the most important question we can ask when voting is what kind of future is livable for all people

item.title: Checking in
item.description: Describe your pain, the doctor said.
